snippet: A massive wildfire in the wilderness that already is the largest in New Mexico history spread in all directions on Thursday, and experts say it is probably a preview of things to come.
abstract: Massive New Mexico wildfire continues to spread in all directions, expanding to nearly 300 square miles; experts say other fires are likely to follow as the West contends with wind, low humidity and abundance of tinder-dry fuels.
lead_paragraph: A massive wildfire in the wilderness that already is the largest in New Mexico history spread in all directions on Thursday, and experts say it is probably a preview of things to come.
